body.p: The Git Accounts tab of the Content Fusion Administration page can be used to configure Git accounts that are used when projects are created in Content Fusion to connect to external Git services. The tab has contains the following options:

dlentry.dd: Clicking the Add account button opens a dialog box where you can enter the Account name, Account user, Account password, and the Server URL.
Once an account has been added, it is listed in this tab and options to Edit or Delete account are available for each added account.
